sections.heading: Water and wastewater business; rates; procedures; responsibility for payments9-511
sections.text: 01.Water and wastewater business; rates; procedures; responsibility for paymentsA. A municipality engaging in a domestic water or wastewater business shall not increase any water or wastewater rate or rate component,
